name: SaveOppy
description:
Opportunity rover was lost but not forgotten. The first man on Mars is on a mission to retrieve Oppy in the middle of a great planetary storm. Can he find Oppy and make it back alive?

WASD - move

Mouse L - INTERACT with items (pickup, drop, use battery)

Mouse R - ON/OFF flashlight (uses more power while ON)

SPACE - USE carried TOOL
